name: Pterosaur Rider
description:
It is a project I've made for The 1 Class Jam.

Your are a pterosaur rider. Your steed is tired and loosing altitude. You need to use your voice (your microphone) to shout at beast if you want it to stay in the skies. If your pterosaur hits the ground - it is Game Over.

Note: press escape key to quit game.
